ResourceHeader.ResourceName: NASA THEMIS GBO White Horse Station
ResourceHeader.Description: White Horse(WHIT) Magnetometer Station is located in Whitehorse, Yukon, Canada. WHIT is part of the UCLA GBO Network. Magnetic Latitude: 63.67 Magnetic Longitude: 279.14 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 10.0167 Magnetic Declination: 23.67 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically:S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the GMAG data

InformationURL.Name: THEMIS Ground Magnetometer Data Center at UCLA
InformationURL.Description: Web server for displaying and downloading THEMIS ground magnetometer data
